title: [FR] Experiment page does not have widgets to display experiment tags or add tags

labels.name: area/uiux
labels.description: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server

body: ### Willingness to contribute No. I cannot contribute a bug fix at this time. ### MLflow version 2.0.1 ### System information - **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Mac and Databricks - **Python version**: 3.8 - **yarn version, if running the dev UI**: ### Describe the problem Unlike the Run, Registered Model and Registered Model Version pages where the object's tags are displayed in the UI along with an "add tag" widget, there are no such widgets in the Experiment page. For consistency, the Experiment page should have the same Look and Feel as the other MLflow object pages. ### Steps to reproduce the bug Just look at the Experiment page. ### Code to generate data required to reproduce the bug _No response_ ### Is the console panel in DevTools showing errors relevant to the bug? _No response_ ### Does the network panel in DevTools contain failed requests relevant to the bug? _No response_
